sentence: You know what, I can say that, just like I can about Brian Kemp and Brad Raffensperger," Lindell said.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: MyPillow CEO Mike Lindell has been served with another defamation suit. This time, it's from a former Dominion employee he once accused of being a 'traitor to the United States of America.'

sentence: Notably, he endorsed former Senator David Perdue, who ran against GOP Governor Brian Kemp for governor, and Representative Jody Hice, who ran for secretary of state against GOP incumbentBrad Raffensperger.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Lindell Claims Georgia Primaries 'Stolen' to Ding Trump Endorsement Cred
